ValidationRule.description: If recurrence type if RecursDaily, then the Recurrence Interval must be provided. Also, if recurrence type is RecursEveryWeekday, then the Recurrence Interval must not be provided.
ValidationRule.errorMessage: One of the following : 1. Recurrence interval MUST be set if the recurrence type is recursDAILY. 2. Recurrence interval MUST NOT be set if the recurrence type is recursEVERYWEEKDAY.
